snippet: Scholars are studying an elusive artifact — nearly invisible traces of Austen’s handwriting on the back of a scrap of paper discovered inside a copy of a book written by Austen’s nephew.
abstract: Scholars are studying an elusive artifact — nearly invisible traces of Austen’s handwriting on the back of a scrap of paper discovered inside a copy of a book written by Austen’s nephew.

headline.main: An Invisible Message from Jane Austen?
